title: Fill in the Blank (1 point per blank)
instructions: Type the correct answer(s) in the blank(s). Do NOT use periods to end your answers.

questions.prompt: A ___ is a snapshot of your repository at a specific point in time that represents a set of changes. It is initially an addition to your local repository
What is a common scripting language used for game development? ___.
The owner of an intellectual property is entitled to ___ revenue generated from that IP. A publisher pays an advance against this revenue to the developer.
If a game plans to use a real-world image or likeness (like a building), it must obtain a ___ from its owner to legally use it in the game.
___ is the most commonly used game engine in AA and AAA game development industry today.
